English: Feel your breath in your chest!
Hold the position for a few breaths.
Bring your knees towards your chest!
hungarian: Húzd a térdedet a mellkasod felé!

English: Change the position of your feet!
Divide the weight over the entire bottom of your foot!
hungarian: Oszd el a súlyt a teljes talpon!

English: Pleace your left hand on the floor!
hungarian: Tedd a bal kezedet a padlóra!

English: Press your palms on the floor!
Lift your knees into the air!
Hug your right knee with your left arm!
hungarian: Bal karjával ölelje át jobb térdét!

English: Turn your right knee to the side!
Raise your arm over your head.
hungarian: Emelje fel a kezét a feje fölé!

English: Reach your arms towards the ceiling!
hungarian: Nyújtsa a kezét a mennyezet felé!

English: Pull your chin towards your chest!
hungarian: Húzza az állát a mellkasa felé!
Lazítsa el a nyakát és az állát!

English: Repeat the same thing in the other side!
hungarian: Ismételje meg ugyanezt a másik oldalon is!
